name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.recordCreate
script:
start:
  await/type:
    form:
      title: Create a record
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_record_type:
          label: Record Type:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.record.types
              inputs:
          limit: 100
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
              filtering@bool: yes
              style: grid
            columns:
              selection/uri:
                params:
                  mode: single
                  label_key: label_plural
                  
  data.query/recordFields:
    inputs:
      query@text:
        type:record.fields
        of:{{prompt_record_type}}
        limit:0
        format:dictionaries
    output: record_fields
  
  await/fields:
    form:
      title: Create {{prompt_record_type}} record
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_record_fields:
          label: Record Fields:
          data@key: record_fields:data
          limit: 50
          default@csv:
            {{
              record_fields.data|filter((field) => field.is_required)|keys|join(',')
            }}
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
              filtering@bool: yes
              style: columns
            columns:
              selection/__index:
                params:
                  mode: multiple
                  label_key: key
                  icon_template@raw: {{is_required ? 'asterisk'}}
              text/type:
                params:
                  value_template@raw: ({{type}})
              #text/notes:
              #  params:
              #    value_template@raw: {{notes|markdown_to_html(is_untrusted=true)|raw}}

  set:
    uniq: {{random_string(6)|lower}}
  
  var.set/command:
    inputs:
      key: command:record.create/{{uniq}}
      value:
        output: new_{{prompt_record_type}}
        inputs:
          record_type: {{prompt_record_type}}
          fields@list:
        on_simulate@list:
        on_error@list:
        on_success@list:
  
  repeat/fields:
    each@csv: {{prompt_record_fields|sort|join(',')}}
    as: prompt_record_field
    do:
      set:
        record_field_type@text,trim:
          {{record_fields.data[prompt_record_field].type}}
        record_field_key@text,trim:
          command:record.create/{{uniq}}:inputs:fields:{{prompt_record_field}}
      decision/type:
        outcome/bit:
          if@bool: {{'bit' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@int: 1
        outcome/file:
          if@bool: {{'file' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@int: 123
        outcome/id:
          if@bool: {{'id' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@int: 123
        outcome/image:
          if@bool: {{'image' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}@text
                value@text:
                  data:image/png;base64,[...Base64-encoded bytes here...]
        outcome/links:
          if@bool: {{'links' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@list:
                  ticket:123
                  -ticket:456
        outcome/list:
          if@bool: {{'list' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@list:
                  option1
                  option2
        outcome/multicheckbox:
          if@bool: {{'multi-checkbox' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@list:
                  option1
                  option2
        outcome/timestamp:
          if@bool: {{'timestamp' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}@date
                value: now
        outcome/url:
          if@bool: {{'url' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value: https://example.com
        outcome/worker:
          if@bool: {{'worker' == record_field_type}}
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@int: 123
        outcome/else:
          then:
            var.set:
              inputs:
                key: {{record_field_key}}
                value@text: value

  return:
    snippet: {{command|kata_encode}}
      # {% set record_uri = prompt_record_type %}
      # record.create/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
      #   output: new_{{record_uri}}
      #   inputs:
      #     # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/commands/record.create/
      #     record_type: {{record_uri}}
      #     fields:
      #       {% for field in prompt_record_fields -%}
      #       {{field}}:
      #       {% endfor %}
      #   #on_simulate:
      #   #on_success:
      #   #on_error:
